sub_title: Looking for a meaningful job in an international and multicultural work environment
summary:
An enthusiastic and dedicated teacher with 7 years experience, the connection with my students comes first. I have worked in different countries, languages, settings and cultures, and with all age profiles (from early age to active professionals ). 
Also a nurse and former HR officer, I value diversity and joy in the learning process, and facilitate it through a differentiated pedagogy, encouragement and positive approach. We are all achievers with the right mindset and setting ! 

As working for the common good is my first priority and can take many different forms, I am also open to administrative positions in the nonprofit sector where I have had exciting successful experiences in the past .
